definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: How to look after your e-dog ?
Do you know how to look after the flowers?
sentences.chinese: 你知道如何照看電子狗嗎？

sentences.english: Is she the master of thee-dog ?No, she isn't.
sentences.chinese: 她是這隻電子狗的主人嗎？

sentences.english: I like this e-dog very much.
sentences.chinese: 我非常喜愛這隻電子狗。

sentences.english: My dog, Qiqi, is an Electronic Pet;
sentences.chinese: 我的小狗奇奇就是這樣的一隻電子狗。

sentences.english: You must take care of thee-dog .
sentences.chinese: 你必須照料好這隻電子狗。

sentences.english: The book's name is your e-dog.
sentences.chinese: 這本書名叫《怎樣照顧你的電子狗》。

sentences.english: And you know they have Bo wearing one of those electronic collars .
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道他們讓波戴上了電子狗鏈。
